    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        public java.lang.Object getAttribute(java.lang.String attribute,
                            Configuration modeConf,
                            java.util.Map objectModel)
                              throws ConfigurationException
        Returns:
        the value of the cookie-crumb whose name matches the attribute "cookie/crumb", or null if there is no match. For example, suppose you call this module "crumb", and you have a cookie called "biscuit" with the value "base=wheat&topping=sugar". Then in your sitemap, {crumb:biscuit/topping} will yield the value "sugar".
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException

      • getAttributeNames

                                   java.util.Map objectModel)
                                     throws ConfigurationException
        Throws:

      • getCookieMap

        protected java.util.Map getCookieMap(java.util.Map objectModel)
        Parameters:
        objectModel - Object Model for the current request
        Returns:
        a Map of {see: HttpCookie}s for the current request, keyed on cookie name.
